title: Bug 123915Add tablefetch limitation when DataSet Editor is populating table names.
description: Bug 123915Add tablefetch limitation when DataSet Editor is populating table names. When fetch table names from database of large volume of data, there lies a possibility that the editor window will be frozen because of the population of huge number of table names.This should be enhanced. A handy solution might be limiting the number of table names being fetched each schema.
